arg.name: start_trajectory_controller
arg.doc: Should we load the joint trajectory controller?

arg.name: paused
arg.doc: Should the simulation directly be stopped at 0s?

arg.name: rotated
arg.doc: Whether you want to use the z-axis of joint 2 as the axis of rotation.

arg.name: x
arg.doc: How far forward to place the base of the stick in [m]?

arg.name: y
arg.doc: How far leftwards to place the base of the stick in [m]?

arg.name: z
arg.doc: How far upwards to place the base of the stick in [m]?

arg.name: roll
arg.doc: How much to rotate the base of the stick around its X-axis in [rad]?

arg.name: pitch
arg.doc: How much to rotate the base of the stick around its Y-axis in [rad]?

arg.name: yaw
arg.doc: How much to rotate the base of the stick around its Z-axis in [rad]?

arg.name: initial_joint_positions
arg.doc: Initial joint configuration of the Stick. Specify as a list of name/value pairs in form of '-J [name-of-joint] [value-in-rad]'. Default is a 90 degree bend in the elbow

param.name: robot_description
param.command: xacro $(find gazebo_torque_calculation_bug)/stick_description/stick_long.urdf.xacro xyz:='$(arg x) $(arg y) $(arg z)' rpy:='$(arg roll) $(arg pitch) $(arg yaw)' rotated:='$(arg rotated)' robot_name:='$(arg robot_name)' safety_controller:='$(arg safety_controller)'
